body:
Comment 3 by **notan.kdev**: 
/**/ comments are for commenting within a line.

Nesting /* /* */ */ are hard to read, because you can never be sure that you saw all 
/* when you see a */. Without nesting */ is definitely the end of the comment.

How do you translate /* /*/ ?

use 
// to comment a block
// of code
// // it does nest
// // well.
// and your editor helps you with 
// entering thousands of slashes

By the way commenting out block of code for later use, is littering.
Use a source version tool for that purposes.
